definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: Gander, Newfoundland is an important transit point for international flights.
sentences.chinese: 甘德，紐芬蘭島是國際航班的重要中轉站。

sentences.english: Kitty disappointed returns the United States, encountered him again in terminal London however.
sentences.chinese: 凱蒂悵然返美，卻在中轉站倫敦又遇見了他。

sentences.english: You can pick one up at virtually any transit station.
sentences.chinese: 所有中轉站幾乎都可以買到月票。

sentences.english: Haiti was already a source of illegal migrants and a crossroads for drugs.
sentences.chinese: 海地已經成爲了非法移民的源頭和販毒的中轉站。

sentences.english: The freight station of the pre-revolutionary time.
sentences.chinese: 在工業革命之前的貨物運輸中轉站。

sentences.english: Therefore, Shexian can Handan transit point for access to all parts of the country.

sentences.english: This means the moon can act as a stepping stone to other planets.

sentences.english: Remember the GDS is just the data conduit….
sentences.chinese: 請謹記，GDS只是數據的中轉站。

sentences.english: We receive telecasts from Beijing through relay stations.
sentences.chinese: 我們通過中轉站接收北京的電視節目。
